preqs: LAW1100 OR LAW1101 AND LAW1102 OR LAW1104Please note that there is an application form for this unit, available at: http://www.law.monash.edu.au/current-students/resources/forms/index.html

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000567}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {LAW1100, LAW1102, LAW1104}

description: This is a program of individual research and writing during two semesters on a legal topic or project which has been approved by the Chief Examiner after consultation with the proposed supervisor. It is expected that some of those topics or projects will be associated with opportunities for placements or internships in legal services in the private or government sectors, in Australia or overseas.
